alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 6:44AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Heart River near Mandan affecting Morton and Burleigh Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Heart River near Mandan. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Wooded banks and lowlands west of Mandan will flood above 17 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.3 feet this afternoon. The river level is expected to slowly fall thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.4 feet on 03/12/2014. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
